title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Pre-Service Teacher Training Based on the Jigsaw Approach for Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can complete a 4-stage (expert group, home group, integration, evaluation) project by applying the jigsaw cooperative learning model online.
Learners can share knowledge with peer teachers and generate collaborative outputs using a wiki platform.
Learners can design three or more collaborative learning scenarios linked to social studies subjects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
